Pre-Game Insights: Igor Stimac emphasized the importance of discipline, focus, and tight marking in the upcoming match.
Sunil Chhetri will retire after the match, making it a significant occasion for Indian football.
Both teams are preparing for a competitive match, with Kuwait expecting to perform better than in previous encounters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be broadcast on Sports 18 channels and streamed live on JioCinema.
